General.Name: V.L. Enterprise Public Company Limited
General.Description: V.L. Enterprise Public Company Limited engages in a tanker fleet business and provides logistical cargo shipping in Thailand. It transports petroleum and chemical products through vessels. The company operates 12 vessels for service of deadweight 38,922 tons with tank volume of 39,664 cubic metres. V.L. Enterprise Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
